tuv.seg: { -brand-short-name } is backed by the non-profit Mozilla, which administers a completely open certificate authority (CA) store. The CA store helps ensure that certificate authorities are following best practices for user security.

Mozilla kipalewia { -brand-short-name }. Yaja se organización te kineki kipiwilia tumin wan kitekimaka se tapiyaluyan tapujtuk ipal tatekimakalis ipal certificados (CA). Ne tapialuyan ipal CA kipalewia pal ma ne tatekimakalis ipal certificados kichiwikan ne tay yek pal kipalewia ne usuarioj.

{ -brand-short-name } uses the Mozilla CA store to verify that a connection is secure, rather than certificates supplied by the user’s operating system. So, if an antivirus program or a network is intercepting a connection with a security certificate issued by a CA that is not in the Mozilla CA store, the connection is considered unsafe.

{ -brand-short-name } kikwi ne tapiyaluyan Mozilla CA pal kita yek su ne musalulis te tesajsay, wan te kita ne certificadoj tay tamakak ne isistema operativo ne usuarioj. Kwakuni, asu se programa antivirus u se matapan nemi kitzkia se musalulis iwan se certificadoj tajpiyalis tay tamakak se CA ne tesu nemi tik ne tapiyaluyan Mozilla CA, ne musalulis nesis tesajsay.
Firefox and the Firefox logos are trademarks of the Mozilla Foundation.
Ne ilojlogoj Firefox wan the Firefox majmarcaj ipal the Mozilla Foundation.
Firefox and the Firefox logos are trademarks of the Mozilla Foundation.
Firefox wan ne Firefox-ishkamet kisat itech ne tiankismachiut pal ne Mozilla Foundation.
{ $hostname } kikwi se teyek certificado ipal tajpiyalis
Someone could be trying to impersonate the site and you should not continue.
Se akaj kiejekua nesi kenha ken ne sitioj pal metzshijshikua, kunij maka shikalaki.
The certificate is not trusted because it was issued by an invalid CA certificate.
Ne certificado tesu muyulmati ika se certificadoj CA tesu yek kititanij.
The certificate is not trusted because the issuer certificate is not trusted.
Ne certificadoj tesu muyulmati ika ne icertificadoj ne ká kititania tesu muyulmati.

Websites prove their identity via certificates. { -brand-short-name } does not trust { $hostname } because its certificate issuer is unknown, the certificate is self-signed, or the server is not sending the correct intermediate certificates.

Ne sitios tik ne matapan kiejekuat inhidentidad iwan ipalewika ne certificados. { -brand-short-name } tesu kiyulmati { $hostname } ika icertificado tesu mumati, ne certificado mutajkwilua isel, u ne servidor tesu kititania ne yejyek certificados intermedios.
Websites prove their identity via certificates, which are issued by certificate authorities.
Ne sitios web kita yek inhidentidad ipanpa certificados. Ini certificados kititaniat ne tatuktianimet ipal certificación.
Account no longer exists. Recreate it?
Tapujka tea nemi. Tikneki tikchiwa uksepa?
Account notifications will now also be sent to %(secondaryEmail)s.
Account notifications will now also be sent to %(secondaryEmailVerified)s.
Ne tanawatilis ipal mutapujka tiktaniat %(secondaryEmailVerified)s nusan.
Talajsili ipal mutapujka te kiski yek
Choose the name you would like to appear in Firefox and when managing your account.
Shikijkwilu mukwachtukay yu-nesi tik Firefox wan ken titajshitia.
Complete set-up by entering the new password on your other Firefox devices.
Shitajshiti nujme iwan ne yankwik taketzalis ichtaka kan tikwi Firefox.
Email resent. Add accounts@firefox.com to your contacts to ensure a smooth delivery.
Titani mutitanijtuk ukpa. Shikishtili accounts@firefox.com mutenutzal pal tikwikwi yek muchi.
Failed to copy. Please manually copy.
If you lose access to your account, youll be able to restore your sync data.
Su te tiweli tikalaki tik mutapujka, tiwelis tikalana muchi ne dajdato.
Once you're finished, use your new password to sign in on all of your devices.
Keman titami, shikwi ne yankwik taketzalis ichtaka pal tiktalia mutukay ka nujme.
Password reset successfully. Sign in to continue.
Mutaketzalis ichtaka mupatak. Shu shiktali mutkay.
Ne achtu itukay mucorreo mupepetatuk yek
Ne ukse itukay mucorreo nemi yek
Thank you for reaching out to Mozilla Support about %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s for %(escapedSelectedPlan)s. We'll contact you via email as soon as possible.
Padiush tinechnawatia tik Tepalewilis Mozilla ipanpa %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s ika %(escapedSelectedPlan)s. Timetznutzasket iwan se titanti.
Thank you for reaching out to Mozilla Support about %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s. We'll contact you via email as soon as possible.
Padiush tinechnawatia tik Tepaliwilis Mozilla ipanpa %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s. Timetznutzasket iwan se titanti.
Te muishmati ne tapujka. kitalij itukay
Use the code %(code)s to set up two-step authentication in supported applications.
Shikwi ne codigo %(code)s pal tikwelitia ne tepepetalis unpa, semaya kan weli muchiwa.
We're sorry to hear about this. If this was a device you really don't trust, you should change your Firefox Account password, and change any passwords saved in Firefox.
Te tiknekiskiat ma ini panu. Su ini tanuska tesu seguro, shikpata ne taketzalis ichtaka ipal mutapujka Firefox, wan nusan shikpata muchi taketzalis ichtaka tikwij tik Firefox.
We're sorry to hear about this. You should change your Firefox Account password, and look for information from your device manufacturer about erasing your data remotely.
Te tiknekiskiat ma ini panu. Shikpata ne taketzalis ichtaka ipal mutapujka Firefox wan shikishtemu ken tiweliskia tikpupua mudajdato ka nujme, kan tikwij.
You are now ready to make changes to your Firefox Account.
Tiwelia titajshitia tik mutapujka ipal Firefox.
You are now ready to use %(serviceName)s
Your account has been locked for security reasons
5 mijmitoj ipanpa ne tayektaliani ipal takezalis ichtaka
Create a free { -brand-fxa }, and you can add up to 15 email addresses.
Shikchiwa se takulijtuk { -brand-fxa }, wan weli tiktalia san 15 titantukayit.
Create an account to monitor up to 15 email address for data breaches. We recommend adding any email addresses you’ve used to create online accounts.
Shikchiwa se ishtapual pal tikishkupawia san 15 titantukayit ipal tamatil taichtekilis. Tinat ma shiktali ankakeski titantukayit tikpia pal kichiwa ishtapal ka matapan.
Tatemulis chupiuk yek ipal kaltapanalis tesajsay
A strong password uses a combination of upper and lowercase letters, special characters, and numbers. It doesn’t contain personal info like your address, birthday, or family names.
Se taketzalis tajpaltik kikwi lejletraj wey wan chikitik, caracter especial, wan tapual. Te kipia intatka mupanpa ken mudirección, keman tinesik nan intujtukay mumiakwan.
Avoid using personal info in passwords
Maka shiktali información mupal tik ne taketzalis ichtaka

A website data breach happens when cyber criminals steal, copy, or expose personal information from online accounts. It’s usually a result of hackers finding a weak spot in the website’s security. Breaches can also happen when account information gets leaked by accident.

Se mukaltapanalis u keman se mukaltapana tik mudajdatoj, yaja ne taichtekit kishkupina wan kalkishtia wan kineshtia muinformación tik ne cuejcuentaj matapan. Panu seujseujti ika ne taichtekit kiajsit kan ne te uij welit mukaltapanat. Uni panu nusan keman ne información ne cuejcuentaj chulua.
{ -brand-name } browser not required for a { -brand-fxa }. You may receive info about { -brand-Mozilla } services.
Ne taiwan titajtachia { -brand-name } tesu muneki pal { -brand-fxa }. Tiweli tikpia información ipanpa tay ne tamaka { -brand-Mozilla }.
{ -brand-name } is tech that fights for your online privacy.
{ -brand-name } ne tepustekitilis ka kimanawia ne muichtakayu ka matapan.
{ $hibp-link } tamakak ne datoj ipanpa ne kaltapanalis
Shikpata ne ichtakatajkwilul ipal ini tzawalamat
Shikpata ne dirección ipan correoj ne nemi ka achtu
Change your password to a strong, unique password.
Shikpata mutaketzalis ichtaka iwan seuk ukchupi tajpaltik wan te kenha seuk.
Could not add email address to database.
Te tiktalijket ne amatitantukayit tik ne tamatilkimil.
Te kineshtia keman kinekit kalakit ichtaka
Create a { -brand-fxa } for your full report of breaches and to get alerts.
Shikchiwa se { -brand-fxa } ipal ne reportej patawak ipanpa ne katapanalis wan pal tikpia tanawatilis.
Create a { -brand-fxa } to monitor your email for ongoing breaches. Once you’ve verified your email, you’ll also receive a full report of past breaches, including sensitive breaches.
Shikchiwa se { -brand-fxa } pal tikpepeta kaltapanalis wijwitz. Kan tikpepettuk mucorreoj, tiu-tikpia se reportej ipal muchi ne kaltapanalis panuket, nusan ne kipiat información ichtaka.
Create unique passwords and save them somewhere safe, like a password manager.
Shikchiwa sechín tajtaketzalis ichtaka wan shikana né kan te weli mukishtia, ken se tayektaliani ipal taketzalis ichtaka.
Cyber criminals could find your password on the dark web and use it to log in to your other accounts. The best way to protect your accounts is to use unique passwords for each one.

Ne teyek takamet tik ne Matapan kiajsiskiat mutaketzalis ichtaka tik ne matapan kunyua wan kikwiskia pal kalaki tik sejseuk cuentaj mupal. Shikwi sanse taketzalis ichtaka pal sejse mucuentaj wan ijkiuni tiktajpia ukchupi yek.
Kaltapanalis tik ne tasentalilis ipal datos

Data aggregators, or data brokers, collect information from public records and buy it from other companies. They compile this data to sell it to companies for marketing purposes. Victims of these breaches are less likely to experience financial fraud, but hackers could use this data to impersonate or profile them.

Ne tasentalilis ipal datoj, u tanamakani ipal datoj, kipena ne iinformación tukniwan, kiana wan kikuilia ujuksé compañíaj. Kisentepewat ini datoj pal kinamaka ujuksé compañiaj pal kichiwat marketing. Ne kiejekuat ini kaltapanalis anka te weli kichtekiliat pero ne pijpirataj welit kikwit ini dajdatoj pal tashijshikuat u pal kichiwat se perfil inpal.
Data breaches are on the rise. If your personal info appears in a new data breach, { -product-name } sends you an alert — so you can take action and protect your accounts.
Ne taichtekilis ipal mudatoj panu ukseujseujti an. Asu mudatoj nesi tik seuk taichtekilis, { -product-name } metznawatis — pal tesu tikejkawa panu uksenpa wan tiktajpia mucuejcuentaj ukyek.
Do I need to do anything if a breach happened years ago or this is an old account?
Ninemi pal nikchiwa taya asu panuk se taichtekilis ashan miak shiwit wan asu ini ishtapual te yankwik?
Due to the sensitive nature of this breach, emails involved are not publicly discoverable. You’re receiving this alert because you’re the verified owner of this email address.
Ipanpa nejmach ini taichtekilis, ne titanamat te weli mutemua. Tikselia ini tanawatilis ika taja ne itekuyu ini titantukayit.
Email me if one of my email addresses below appears in a data breach.
Shinechtuktili asu se ipal nudirección ipal correoj muajsi tik ne kaltapanalis ipal datoj.
Enroll multiple emails in breach monitoring
Shikachitili miak correoj kan mupepetat ne kajkaltapanalis
Even for old accounts, it’s important to update your password.
Nusan iwan se muishmachiu palikman, nemi pal tikyankwilia muichtakatajkwilul.
Find out if your data was exposed in this breach.
Shikmati asu mudajdatoj muneshtijket keman mukaltapanket.
Find out if you’ve been part of a data breach
Find out if you’ve been part of a data breach with { -product-name }. Sign up for alerts about future breaches and get tips to keep your accounts safe.
Shikita asu ajaka kichtek ichtaka mudatoj iwan { -product-name }. Shikchiwa se cuentaj pal timetznawatisket wan timetzmachtisket ken tiktajpia mucuentaj.
Find out what hackers already know about you. Learn how to stay a step ahead of them.
Shikajsi ne tay ne hacker kimatiaya mupanpa. Shimumachti ken tiweli titayakana ka inhishpan.
Find out what you need to do to keep your data safe from cyber criminals.
Shimumachti tay muneki pal tiktajpia mutamatil wan hackers te kichtekit ichtaka.
Get help creating better passwords and keeping them safe.
Shiktajtani ma metzpalewi tikchiwa ukchupi yek taketzalis ichtaka wan tiktajpia
Get help remembering all your passwords and keeping them safe.
Ma metzpalewi tikelnamiki muchi mutajtaketzalis ichtaka wan ma kitajpia.
Get ongoing breach monitoring for multiple email addresses.
Shikpepeta mukaltapanalis tik miak dijdirección correoj.

Hackers may try to use that same password and your email to get in to other accounts. Create a different and unique password for every account, especially for your bank account, email, and other websites where you save personal information.

Ne hackers anka kikalaktisket ne sesan taketzalis ichtaka wan kikwisket mucorreoj pal kalakit tik ujukse cuentaj. Shikchiwa se taketzalis ichtaka te kenha wan ma te keman mukwijtuk ipal sejse cuentaj, wan ipal ne icuentaj mutuminkal, correoj, wan ujukse iswat ka matapan kan tiktajpia ne muinformación.
Have your online accounts been exposed in a data breach?
Tichikuyulua ajaka kichtek ush kineki kikwi ne mukwejkwentaj online?
Here’s what’s changed since you signed up for { -product-name }, the service that monitors known data breaches for your personal info. We’re linking it to Firefox accounts.
Ini tay mupatak kwak tipan tiktalij mutukay tik { -product-name } , ne tayekultilis ne kishkupawia tamatil taichtekilis kan nemi mutamatilsyu. Tiknepanuat iwan ne Firefox ishtapal.
Here’s your summary of past data breaches
Tay { -product-name } kichiwa iwan ne sijsitioj ichtaka?
How do I know this is a legitimate email from { -product-name }?
Ken nikmati asu ini se correoj tejkia ipal { -product-name }?
However, it did appear in { $breachCount } other breaches.
Melka, yaja neski tik { $breachCount } seuk mukaltapanalis.
However, it did appear in { $breachCount } other known breaches.
Melka yaja kia nesik tik { $breachCount } sejseuk mukaltapanalis matituk
Ken nikishtia nutukay tik ne tanawatilis { -product-name }
I don’t recognize one of these companies or websites. Why am I in this breach?
Te nikishmati ini tekipan u tzawalamat. Taika ninemi tik ini taichtekilis?
I don’t recognize this company or website. Why am I in this breach?
Naja te nikishmati ini compañiaj u sitioj Matapan. Taika ninemi tik ini kaltapanalis?

If you can’t log in, contact the website to ask how to update it. See an account you don’t recognize? Your data could have been sold or redistributed. This could also be an account you forgot you created or a company that changed names.

Asu te tiweli tikalaki tik mucuentaj, shiknawati ne iswat ka matapan ma metzilwi ken tikyankwilia. Tikita se cuentaj tesu tikmati? Mudajdatoj anka munamaskiat u mumajmakatuk ka senkak. Yajini anka nusan se cuentaj tiklelnamikik tikchiwki u anka se compañíaj kipatak ne tujtukay.
If your information surfaces in a new data breach, we’ll send you an alert.
Asu muinformación nesi tik se kaltapanalis yankwik, tiu-timetztitaniliat se tanawatilis.
If you use { -brand-name }, you’ll receive a notification if you visit a site that’s been breached. Find out right away if you were part of that breach and what you can do about it.
Asu tikwi { -brand-name }, tiu-tikpia se tanawatilis asu tipashalua tik se sitioj kikaltapanket. Shikmati nemanha asu kikaltapan muinformación wan tay tiweli tikchiwa ipanpa.
I just found out I’m in a data breach. What do I do next?
San nikmatki ka ninemi tik se tamatil taichtekilis. Tay nikchiwa?
It can sometimes take months or years for credentials exposed in a data breach to appear on the dark web. Breaches get added to our database as soon as they have been discovered and verified.

Weli ishtuna sejsé metzti u shiwit achtu ma ne crejcredencial mukishtijtuk tik ne kaltapanialis ipal datoj nesikan tik ne Matapan kunyua. Musentaliat ne kaltapanalis tik tubasej ipal datoj kan muajsitiwit wan mupepettiwit.
It’s easy to find birthdays, addresses, and family member names online. Keep these words out of your passwords.
Te uij muajsit ne tunal tinesik, mudirección, wan ne intujtukay muikniwan tik ne matapan. Maka shiktali ini tajtaketzalis tik ne taketzalis ichtaka.
Known data breaches have exposed your info
Make the new password different and unique
Shikchiwa ne yankwik taketzalis ichtaka tekenha wan isel

Most breaches only expose emails and passwords, but some do include sensitive financial information. If your bank account or credit card numbers were exposed, alert your bank to possible fraud. Monitor statements for charges you don’t recognize.
Achka muchi ne taichtekilis ipal datoj kiwawana ne itukay mucorreoj wan taketzalis-ichtaka, man sejse kia kanat weyuk datoj ipal mutumin.
Most people have about 100 online accounts. Have any of yours been exposed in a data breach? Find out.
Achka muchi kipia 100 cuentaj salujtuk. Have any of yours been exposed in a data breach? Find out.
No other breaches found from a basic search.
Te muajsik seuk mukaltapanalis tik ini talul tatemulis.
On { $breachDate }, { $breachTitle } was breached. Once the breach was discovered and verified, it was added to our database on { $addedDate }.
Ne { $breachDate }, mukaltapanket tik { $breachTitle }. Kan muajsik wan muyekitak ne mukaltapanalis, yaja mutalij tik ne basej dajdatoj tik { $addedDate }.
Password managers like 1Password, LastPass, Dashlane, and Bitwarden store your passwords and fill them in to websites for you. They’ll even help you make strong passwords.

Tajpianimet ipal taketzalis ichtaka ken 1Password, LastPass, Dashlane, wan Bitwarden kiana mutajtaketzalis ichtaka wan kiishtukilia mumaku. Yejemet yawit kichiwat tajtaketzalis ichtaka chupiuk tajpaltik.

Password managers like 1Password, LastPass, Dashlane, and Bitwarden store your passwords securely and fill them into websites for you. Use a password manager on your phone and computer so you don’t have to remember them all.

Ne tajpianimet ipal taktezalis ichtaka ken 1Password, LastPass, Dashlane, wan Bitwarden kianat wan kitajpia mutaketzalis ichtaka wan kishtukat tik ne iswat ka matapan. Shikwi se tajpiani ipal taketzalis ichtaka wan shiktali tik mutanutzalis wan tepustapuani pal tesu nemi pal tikelnamiki muchi yejemet.
Ne ijichtaka taketzalis muneshtijket tik muchi ne mukaltapanalis
{ -product-name } found your email in a new data breach
{ -product-name } kiajsik mucorreoj tik se kaltapanalis yankwik dajdatoj
{ -product-name } found your info in these breaches

{ -product-name } only reveals accounts associated with these types of breaches after an email address has been verified. This means you’re the only person who can see if your information was in this breach (unless someone else has access to your email account).

{ -product-name } semaya kineshtia ne cuejcuentaj senhijilpituk iwan ini tipoj ipal kaltapanalis keman se dirección pal correoj mupepettuka. Kineki ina ka maya taja tiweli tikita asu kikaltapanket muinformación (a menos que uksé weli kalaki tik mucuentaj ipal correoj).

{ -product-name } warns if your online accounts were involved in a data breach. Find out if you’ve been in a data breach, get alerts about new breaches, and take steps to protect your online accounts. { -product-name } is provided by { -brand-Mozilla }.

{ -product-name } tanawatia asu mucuejcuentaj tik ne matapan nemiket tik se kaltapanalis. Shikmati asu tinemik tik se kaltapanalis, shikita ne tanawatalis ipanpa yajyankwik kaltapanalis, wan shikpalewi mucuejcuentaj tik ne matapan. { -brand-Mozilla } metzmaka { -product-name }
{ -product-name } warns you about data breaches involving your personal info. So far, no breaches were found. We’ll send you an alert if your email address appears in a new breach.
{ -product-name } metznawatia ipanpa se tamatil taichtekilis ne nemi itech mutamatilisyu. Ijkiashan, te kanaj se taichtekilis. Tiu-timetznawatiat asu mutitantukay nesi tik se yankwik taichtekilis.
{ -product-name } warns you about data breaches involving your personal info. We just received details about another company’s data breach.
{ -product-name } metznawatia ipanpa se tamatil taichtekilis ne nemi itech mutamatilisyu. San tikselijket tamatilis ipanpa se taichtekilis tik seuk tekipan.
{ -product-name } warns you about data breaches involving your personal info. You’re also signed up to receive alerts if your email address appears in a new breach.
{ -product-name } metznawatia ipanpa se tamatil taichtekilis ne nemi itech mutamatilisyu. Nusan tiktalijtuk mutukay pal tikselia tanawatilis asu mutitantukay nesi tik se yankwik taichtekilis.

{ -product-name } warns you if your email address has been exposed in an online data breach. See if your information has been exposed, learn how to better protect your online accounts, and get alerted if your email address appears in a new breach.

{ -product-name } metznawatia asu mudirección ipal correoj mutapujtuk tik se kaltapanalis ipal datoj tik ne matapan. Shikita asu muinformación mutapujtuk, shikmati ken tiweli tikpalewia ukchupi yek mucuejcuentaj tik ne matapan, wan shikwi tanawatilis asu mudirección ipal correoj nesi tik uksé yankwik kaltapanalis.
Shiktitani uksenpa ne correoj kan mupepettuk.
Search all your email addresses for breaches and get alerts about new threats.
Shiktemu itzalan muchi ne itujtukay correoj asu kaltapanket tik yejemet wan ma metznawatikan keman metzmajmawat uksenpa.
Search for your email address in public data breaches going back to 2007.
Shiktemu mudirección correoj tik ne kaltapanalis pal datoj ipal tukniwan hasta 2007.
Search for your email address in public data breaches going back to 2007. This basic search will surface most data breaches, but not ones that contain sensitive personal information.
Shiktemu ne mutitantukay tik ne tamatilichtekilis ne pejket tik 2007. Ini tatemulis yu-kineshtia kachka muchi ne tamatilichtekilis, pero tesu yu-kineshtia ichtaka tamatilis mupanpa.
Security tips to protect your accounts
Tanawatilis ipal tapalewilis pal tikmanawi mucuejcuentaj
Security tips to protect yourself from hackers
Tanawatilis pal timumanawia itech ne taichtekit
See all data breaches in one place so you know which passwords to change. The breach dashboard is only available with an account.
Shikita muchi tamatil taichtekilis ka senkak pal tikmati katiawel ichtakatajkwilul pal tikpata. Ne taichtekilis tamatiltachialis semaya ijtuk iwan se ishtapual.
See if you’ve been part of an online data breach.
Shikita asu se mukaltapan tik mudajdatoj matapan
See if you were in this breach
Shikita asu tinenki tik ini kaltapanalis
Select your browser’s back button, reload the page, and try again.
Shikpachu ne botón ka ipan ipal ne tay iwan titajtachia, shikalaki uksenpa tik ne iswat, wan shikejeku uksenpa.
Kaltapanalis ipal ne datuj tik se iswat ka matapan
Short, single-word passwords are easy for hackers to guess. Use at least two words and a combination of letters, digits, and special characters.
Ne taketzalis ichtaka kutu u iwan maya se taketzalis, yaja te uij pal kimatit ne hackers.
Show all breaches for this email.
Shikneshti muchi ne kaltapanalis ipal ini correoj.
Shiktali mutukay pal metznawatia ipanpa ne kaltapanalis
Sorry, that breach is not in our database.
Uni mukaltapanalis tesu kanaj tik ne basej ipal dajdatoj tupal.
Kaltapanalis tik ne listaj ipal correoj kupajsul
Steps to take to protect your online identity
Makaya shikwi ne sesan taketzalis ichtaka
Stop using that exposed password entirely.
Makaya shikwi ne taketzalis ichtaka muneshtijkia.
Stop using the exposed password, and change it everywhere you’ve used it.
Makaya shikalakti ne sesan taketzalis-ichtaka wan shikpata nujme kan tikalaktijtuk.
Take action to protect your accounts
Take back control of your personal data.
Take further steps to protect your identity
There is a way to protect your privacy. Join { -brand-name }.
The strength of your passwords directly impacts your online security.
Asu mutaketzalis ichtaka tajpaltik, ijkiuni timupalewia tik ne matapan
This email address is not subscribed to { -product-name }.
Ini amatitantukayit tesu kipia itukay tik { -product-name }.
This email appeared in { $breachCount } known data breaches.
Ini correoj neski tik { $breachCount } mukajkaltapanalis matituk
This email appeared in { $breachCount } known data breaches, including { $breachName }.
Ini correoj neski tik { $breachCount } mukaltapanalis ipal majmattuk dajdatoj, nusan{ $breachName }.
This email appeared in the { $breachName } breach.
Ini correoj neski tik ne mukaltapanalis { $breachName }.
This email did not appear in the { $breachName } breach.
Ne correoj tesu neski tik ne mukaltapanalis { $breachName }.
This email has already been added to { -product-name }.
This will remove your email from the { -product-name-nowrap } list and you will no longer receive alerts when new breaches are announced.
Yajini yawi kishtia ne itukay muamatitan tik ne listaj { -product-name-nowrap } wan tea yawi metznawatia keman kinekit kalakit ichtaka uksenpa.
To finish verifying this email for { -product-name }, you must be signed in under your primary account email.
Pal titamia tikita yek ini amatitanti ipal { -product-name }, nemi pal tikpia mutukay ken ne achtu cuentaj ipal ne amatitanti.
Turn off { -product-name } alerts. Your { -brand-fxa } will remain active, and you may receive other account-related communications.
Shiksewi ne tanawatilis ipal { -product-name }. Mu{ -brand-fxa } yawi naka mutimakatuk, wan tiu-tikpia seuk tanujnutzalis ipal cuentaj.
Unlike a website breach, there’s no password to change.
Ika tesu se kaltapanalis, te nemi pal mupata ne taketzalis ichtaka.
Pal tikishtia mutukay, kineki se token.
Unsubscribing requires a token and emailHash.
Pal tikishtia mutukay, kineki se token wan emailHash.
Use a password manager to create strong, unique passwords. Password managers securely store all your logins so you can access them across all your devices.

Shikwi se tajpiani taketzalis ichtaka pal tikchiwa taketzalis ichtaka tajpaltik wan te kenha ken seuk. Ne tajpianimet taketzalis ichtaka tajpia kiana muchi mukalakilis pal tiweli tikalaki yek tik muchi muaparatoj
{ $userEmail } appeared in a new data breach
{ $userEmail } nesik tik se yankwik tamatil taichtekilis
Kineki se token pal tikita yek.
Verify your email to add it to { -product-name } and sign up for breach alerts.
Shiknelti mutitantukay pal tiktalia iwan { -product-name } wan shiktali mutukay pal tiknawatiat taichtekilis.
Shikita su yek nemi mutukay tik { -product-name }.
Visit your { $preferencesLink } to check the status of { $userEmail }.
Shipashalu tik mu { $preferencesLink } pal tikpepeta ne estadoj ipal { $userEmail }.
Was your info exposed in the { $breachName } data breach?
Ne muinformación muneshtij keman muichtektuk ne dajdatoj { $breachName }?
Kaltapanalis tik ne iswat ipal matapan
We’re worried you might be a bot because you searched several email addresses in a short time period. For now, you’re blocked from new searches. You can try again later.
Timukakasujtiwit ika anka taja se bot ika tiktemuj miak dijdirección correoj sujsul talul. Sanuk tajta timutentzaktuk wan te tiweli titatemua. Shikejeku neman.
What to do after a data aggregator breach:
Tay nemi pal tikchiwa ipan se kaltapanalis tik ne tasentalilis ipal datoj:
What to do after a data breach
Tay weli tikchiwa kan mukaltapana mudatoj
What to do after a website breach:
Tay nemi pal tikchiwa ipan se kaltapanalis ipal información:
Why did it take so long to notify me of this breach?
Taika teutakik nechilwia ipanpa ini kaltapanalis?
Why did it take so long to report this breach?
Taika tiishtunki titanawatia ipanpa ini kaltapanalis?
You are monitoring the maximum number of email addresses.
Tikpepeta muchi ne amatitantukayit weli tikpepeta
You can’t stop hackers from hacking. But you can avoid bad habits that make their work easy.
Tesu tiweli ma ne hackers kichtekit nemit mudatoj, man tiweli tikajkawa tikchiwa tay tesu metzpalewia wan muchiwa ukyek mutekiw.
You’ll need to unsubscribe from one of the emails { -product-name } sent.
Shikwi se ipal mucojcorreoj ne { -product-name } kititan pal tikishtia mutukay.
You’ll need to unsubscribe from one of the emails { -product-name } sent you. Check your inbox for messages from { -brand-team-email }. Select the unsubscribe link at the bottom of the email.

Tinemi pal tikishtia mutukay tik se ipal ne cojcorreoj { -product-name } metztitanilij. Shikita ne mucorreoj wan shiktemu se titani ipal { -brand-team-email }. Shikpachu ne ilpika ne muajsi ka ikshi ne correoj pal tikishtia mutukay .
You’ll still receive alerts from { -product-name }. We’ll let you know if your info appears in a new data breach.
Kenhayuk tikselis tanawatilis ipal { -product-name }. Timetznawatisket asu mutamatilisyu ijtuk tik se yankwik tamatilichtekilis.
You must be signed in to your { -brand-fxa }.
You’re receiving this email because you signed up for { -product-name } alerts. No longer want these emails? { $unsubLink }. This is an automated email. For support, visit { $faqLink }.
Tikselia ini titanamat ika tiktalijtuk mutukay iwan { -product-name } tanawatilis. Tea tikneki ini titanamat? { $unsubLink }. Ini se titanamat. Ken tepalewilis, shikita { $faqLink }.
You’re receiving this email because you signed up for { -product-name } alerts. This is an automated email. For support, visit { $faqLink }.
Tikselia ini titanamat ika tiktalijtuk mutukay iwan { -product-name } tanawatilis. Ini se titanamat. Ken tepalewilis, shikita { $faqLink }.
You’re signed up to receive { -product-name } alerts when your email appears in a data breach. Here’s what we know about this breach.
{ -product-name } metzilwia keman mucorreoj muajsi tik se kaltapanalis datoj. Nikan tiweli tikmati ipanpa ini kaltapanalis.
Your information was discovered in a new data breach.
Muajsik muinformación tik se yankwik kaltapanalis datoj
Your right to be safe from hackers starts here.
Nikan tipewa timutajpia itech ne hackers.
You tried to scan too many email addresses in a short time period. For security reasons, we’ve temporarily blocked you from new searches. You’ll be able to try again later.
Tiktemujtuk miak amatitantukayit tik achi kawit. Ken tamanawilis, tiktzaktiwit ka tikchiwa yankwik tatemulis. Shikejeku neman.
%1$s is free and open source software made by Mozilla and other contributors.
%1$s te metztajtanilia tumin wan yaja se software ipal walajkewalis tapujtuk. Mozilla wan sejseuk kichijtiwit mupal.
%1$s will send what you type in the address bar to your search engine
%1$s yawi kititania tay titajkwilua tik ne barraj ipal dirección tik ne tepusyulu taishtemua
Add and manage custom autocomplete URLs.
Shiktali u shina ken taja tikneki ma temi isel ne URLs.
Shiktali se ilpika pal temi isel
Add shortcuts to your home screen
Shiktali tamelawka tik ne achtu iswat
An installed search engine is already using that name.
Seuk tepusyulu tatemua kipiaya ne sesan itukay.
As a private browser, we never save and cannot restore this tab.
Ika se tajtachialis ichtaka, tejemet te keman tikanat nian talneshtiat ini itzun.
Autocomplete URLs for sites you use most\n Long-press any URL in the address bar
Ma temit isel ne URLs ipal kan taja sejsenpa tipashalua\n Shikpajpachu ne URL tay tikneki ijtik ne barraj ipal dirección
Shipashalu ichtaka ka achtu.\nShipashalu. Shitapupu. Shikchiwa uksenpa.
Shiktentzakwa semaya ne cookies ipal sejseuk
Shiktentzakwa semaya ne cookies tapachiwiani ipal sejseuk
Shiktentzakwa ujukseuk tapachiwiani ipal tay kipia kalijtik
Block potentially dangerous and deceptive sites
Ma mutentzakwakan ne sijsitioj tesajsay wan tashijshikuani
Block reported deceptive and attack sites, malware sites, and unwanted software sites.
Shiktentzakwa ne sijsitioj tesajsay wan tashijshikuani, sitioj malware. wan sitioj ipal software tesu tikneki.
Shiktentzakwa ne tapachiwiani kimati kan tinejnemi
Shiktentzakwa ne tajkwilultzin ipal ne Matapan
Check that search string matches Example format
Shikpepeta ma ne tajtaketzalis tejtemujtuk kenha ken nemi ne Machiut
Shiktentzakwa ne tay nemi ka kalijtik
Cookies wan ne idatuj ne sitioj
Kan tiksenputzua datuj wan ken tikwi
Maka shikwi tay muajsik tik ne iswat
Embedded on sites to track your visits and to display functionality like share buttons
Muishtukatuk kan tipashalua pal metzishpelwia wan pal kineshtia ken yaja tekiti kenha ken ne bojbotón pal tiktakulia
Enable to autocomplete more than 450 popular URLs in the address bar.
Shiktimaka su tikneki ma temi isel wan nemit 450 ush ukchupi URLs tik ne barraj ipal direccion.
Enable to autocomplete more than 450 popular URLs in the address bar.
Shiktimaka su tikneki ma temi isel wan nemit 450 ush ukchupi URLs tik ne barraj ipal direccion.
Enabling may cause some pages to behave unexpectedly
Asu tiktimaka, sejseuk iswat welit tekitit ken te tikchia
Shiktajkwilu ne itukay ne tepusyulu tatemua
Tikneki tikisa tik ne ichtaka pashalulis?
Find an app that can open link
Shikajsi se aplicación weli kitapua ne ilpika
Finger moved too fast. Try again.
Tikpanultij mumapipil sujsul talul. Shikejeku uksenpa.
Ne mapipiltashkal tesu muishmati. Shikejeku uksenpa.
Get one-tap access to sites you use most%1$s Menu > Add to Home screen
Shiktasa sema senpa pal tikalaki tik ne ijiswat taja tikita mas%1$s Menu > Shiktalili tik Achtu Iswat
Hide webpages when switching apps and block taking screenshots.
Shikinaya ijiswat kwak tikpata aplicación wan maka shikajkawa ma muishkupina ne pantallaj.
May result in missing icons or images
Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %1$s for everyone.
Mozilla kineki kiululua sema tay timunekit pal tikmakat wan tikekchiwiliat muchi ne %1$s.
None of the apps on your device are able to open this link. You can leave %1$s to search %2$s for an app that can.
Te kanaj se aplicación weli kitapua ini ilpika. Tiweli tikisa tik %1$s pal tiktemua %2$s ipal se aplicación weli kitapua.\n\n
Notifications let you erase your %1$s session with a tap. You don’t need to open the app or see what’s running in your browser.
Tajtanawatilis metzajkawat tikpupua mu%1$s tanamikilis kan tiktasa iwan mumapipil. Te nemi pal tiktapu ne aplicacion ush pal tikita tay panu tik ne tajtachialis.
Open a link in a new tab\n Long-press any link on a page
Shiktapu se ilpika tik ukse itzun\n Shikpajpachu yek ne ilpika taja tikneki tik se iswat
Open every link in %1$s\n Set %1$s as default browser
Shiktapu sejse ilpika %1$s\n Shikchiwa %1$s ken ne achtutalijtuk tajtachialis
Shiktapu ne ilpika tik seuk aplicación
Pages may load faster, but may also behave unexpectedly
Ne iswat weli mukimiltia uk talul, melka tesu weli tekiti ken taja te tikneki
Rather see the full desktop site?%1$s Menu > Request desktop site
Tiknekiskia tikita muchi ne tajkwilultapech?%1$s Menu > Shiktajtani ne sitioj ipal ne tajkwilultapech
Ma mukimilti ne sitioj matapan uksenpa
Shikishti muchi ne sitioj ipal ne matapan
Shina tay te yek tik ne sitioj
Return to your favorite sites in %1$s quickly. Just select \"Add to Home screen\" from the %1$s menu.
Shimukwepa tik ne sitioj kan mugustuj tipashalua %1$s talul. Semaya shikishpejpena \"Shiktali tik ne Achtu Iswat\" itech ne menú %1$s.
Shiktemu ne itukay ne tepusyulu tatemua
Searching for something different? Choose another default search engine in Settings.
Tiktemua seuk? Shikajshiti ukse achtutalijtuk tepusyulu tatemua.
Shiktitani ne datuj ipanpa keski seujti nipashalua
Set %1$s as your default browser and get the benefits of private browsing when you open webpages from other apps.
Shikajshiti %1$s ken tajtachialis mupal wan tikitas ka tiweliskia tipashalua ichtaka kwak tiktapua ijiswat tik ujukse aplicaciones.
Shiktali ma senpa nemi achtu, ma temi isel
Shortcut will open with Tracking Protection disabled
Ne tamelawka tapui kwak sewtuk ne Tamanawilis itech Tapachiwiani
Ma nesikan tanajnawatial tik ne achtu iswat
Site behaving unexpectedly?\n Try turning off Tracking Protection
Kan titajtachia te tekiti ken tikneki?\n Anka su tiksewia Tamanawalis itech Tapachiwiani
Some ads track site visits, even if you don’t click the ads
Sejse tanawatilis kishpelwiat kan tipashalua, melka tesu tikpachua
Some search engines cannot show suggestions.
Sejse tepusyulu tatemuat te welit tanawatiat.
Sorry. We’re having a problem with this tab.
Shitapupulwi. Saman tikpiat uijkayu iwan ini itzun.
Switch to link in new tab immediately
Shiktapu ne ilpika melaktik tik ukse itzun
Tab’s browsing history has been erased.
Mupupujtuk kan tipashaluj tik ne ijitzun.
Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
Tiweli tipashalua ichtaka te kenha ken ne sejseuk. Shiktentzakwa muchi ne tanawatilis ush muchi tay weliskia metzpachiwia keman tikita ne sitioj wan tay kichiwa yujyulik kan mukimiltiat ne ijiswat.
To get search suggestions, %1$s needs to send what you type in the address bar to the search engine you’ve chosen. %2$s.
Asu tikneki ma timetzilwikan tay tiktemua, %1$s muneki kititania tay titajkwilua tik ne barraj ipal ne dirección ipal ne tepusyulu taishtemua taja tikishpejpen. %2$s.
Touch the fingerprint sensor to continue.
Shikchijchimi ne sensor ipal ne mapipiltashkal pal tikalaki.
Kan tikishpejpena ne tapachiwiani, cookies, wan dajdatuj
Trusted site?\n Allowlist disables Tracking Protection for sites you know and trust.
Tineltuka tik ne iswat?\n Tesu tiwelit timetztajpia itech ne tapachiwiani su tina muchi nemi yek tik ini sitioj.
Turning this off may fix some site problems
Su tiksewia yajini, yaja weli kiekchiwa sejse uijkayu tik ne sitioj
Turn off tips on the start screen
Ma musewi ne tajtanawatial ijpak ne achtu iswat
Turn off to fix some sites
Used to collect, analyze and measure activities like tapping and scrolling
Mukwi pal mukululua, muishpepeta wan mutamachiwa tay tikchiwa keman titatasa wan titamatilua
Shiktali ne itashkalchin mumapipil pal tikalaki tik ne aplicación
Would you like to turn on search suggestions?
Tiknekiskia ma timetzmakakan tay tiweliskia tiktemua?
You can leave %1$s to open this link in %2$s.
Tiweli tikisa tik %1$s pal tiktapua ini ilpika tik %2$s.
You have disabled Content Blocking for these websites.
Taja tiksewij Tatentzakwalis ipal Tay Nemi ka Ijtik ipal ne isijsitioj ne Wey Matat.
Your browsing history has been erased.
Your fingerprint can unlock %1$s if a URL is already opened in the app. Stealth will be turned on.
Ne itashkalchin mumapipil weli kimakishtia %1$s su se URL nemia tapujtuk tik ne aplicación. Yawi nemi tik modoj ichtaka.
As a private browser, we never save and cannot restore your last browsing session.
Ika se tajtachialis ichtaka, tejemet te keman tikanat tay tikitak yewasan.
Autocomplete URLs for sites you use most Long-press any URL in the address bar
Ma temit isel ne URLs ipal kan taja sejsenpa tipashalua Shikpajpachu ne URL tay tikneki ijtik ne barraj ipal dirección
Automatic private browsing. Browse. Erase. Repeat.
Shipashalu ichtaka ka achtu. Shipashalu. Shitapupu. Shikchiwa uksenpa.
Downloaded files will not be deleted when you erase %1$s history.
Ne archivoj temultijtuk te yawi mupupua kwak tikpupua %1$s tay tikitak yewa.
Embedded on sites to track your visits and to display functionality like share buttons
Muishtukatuk kan tipashalua pal metzishpelwia wan pal kineshtia ken yaja tekiti kenha ken ne bojbotón pal tiktakulia
Enable to autocomplete more than 450 popular URLs in the address bar.
Shiktimaka su tikneki ma temi isel wan nemit 450 ush ukchupi URLs tik ne barraj ipal direccion.
Enable to have %1$s autocomplete over 450 popular URLs in the address bar.
Shiktimaka pal ma %1$s temi isel tik 450 URLs muishmattuk tik ne barraj direccion.
Enabling may cause some pages to behave unexpectedly
Asu tiktimaka, sejseuk iswat welit tekitit ken te tikchia

Shiktapu se ilpika tik ukse itzun Shikpajpachu yek ne ilpika taja tikneki tik se iswat

Shiktapu sejse ilpika %1$s Shikchiwa %1$s ken ne achtutalijtuk tajtachialis
Shiktapu ne ilpika tik ukse itzun
Se uijkayu panuk keman mukimiltia ne iswat
Return to your favorite sites in %1$s quickly. Just select "Add to Home screen" from the %1$s menu.
Shimukwepa tik ne sitioj kan mugustuj tipashalua %1$s talul. Semaya shikishpejpena "Shiktali tik ne Achtu Iswat" itech ne menú %1$s.
Saved and shared images will not be deleted when you erase %1$s history.
Ne kwijkwil muantuk wan mutakulijtuk tesu yawi mupuluat keman tikpupua ne tay tikitak yewa %1$s.
Site behaving unexpectedly? Try turning off Tracking Protection
Kan titajtachia te tekiti ken tikneki? Anka su tiksewia Tamanawalis itech Tapachiwiani
Some ads track site visits, even if you don’t click the ads
Sejse tanawatilis kishpelwiat kan tipashalua, melka tesu tikpachua
Sorry. %1$s had a problem and crashed.
Shitapupulwia. %1$s kipishki se uijkayu wan kunaktuk tzaktuk.
Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
Tiweli tipashalua ichtaka te kenha ken ne sejseuk. Shiktentzakwa muchi ne tanawatilis ush muchi tay weliskia metzpachiwia keman tikita ne sitioj wan tay kichiwa yujyulik kan mukimiltiat ne ijiswat.
Ne iswat tesu muchiwa redireccionar yek
Trusted site? Allowlist disables Tracking Protection for sites you know and trust.
Tineltuka tik ne iswat? Tesu tiwelit timetztajpia itech ne tapachiwiani su tina muchi nemi yek tik ini sitioj.
Turn off tips on the %1$s start screen
Shiksewi ne tanawatilis ijtik ne achtu iswat ipal %1$s

• Check the address for typing errors such as ww.example.com instead of www.example.com
  • If you are unable to load any pages, check your device’s data or Wi-Fi connection.

• Shikpepeta ne dirección pal tikita su nemi ejerror kenha ken ww.example.com ipatka www.example.com
  • Su tesu tiweli tikimiltia nian se sitioj, shikpepeta ne titanti ipal mutanutzalis ush su ne Wi-Fi salujtuk nemi.

• The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.
  • If you are unable to load any pages, check your mobile device’s data or Wi-Fi connection.

• Uksan ne sitioj tesu weli tekiti ush kipia wey itekiw. Shikejeku uksenpa nemanha.
  • Asu te weli mukimiltia ne sitioj, shikita ne tijtitanti ipal mutanutzalis ush asu ne Wi-Fi musalujtuk nemi.

• This could be a problem with the server’s configuration, or it could be someone trying to impersonate the server.
  • If you have connected to this server successfully in the past, the error may be temporary, and you can try again later.

• Yajini anka se ujkayu iwan ken muajshitij ne servidor, ush anka akaj kineki kichiwa personificar ne servidor.
  • Su taja timusalujtuk itech ini servidor achtu, ne error anka tesu ishtuna, ush tiweli tikejekua uksenpa nemanha.
• This problem can sometimes be caused by disabling or refusing to accept cookies.
• Ini uijkayu anka panu ika seujseujti tesu tikneki tikajkawa tekitit ne cookies.

• Web addresses are usually written like http://www.example.com/
  • Make sure that you’re using forward slashes (i.e. /).

• Ne direccion web nesi kenha ken http://www.example.com/
  • Shiktemu uksenpa asu tikwi tinemi ne barraj ishpilkatuk (i.e.: /).
• You might need to install other software to open this address.
• Anka ukse programaj muneki ma muajshiti pal tapui ne direccion.
Used to collect, analyze and measure activities like tapping and scrolling
Mukwi pal mukululua, muishpepeta wan mutamachiwa tay tikchiwa keman titatasa wan titamatilua iwan mumapipil
We can’t load this page for some reason.
Anka se te kiajkawa mukimiltia ini iswat.
Your fingerprint can unlock %1$s if a URL is already opened in the app. Stealth will be turned on.
Ne itashkalchin mumapipil weli kisutuma %1$s su se URL nemia tapujtuk tik ne aplicación. Yawi nemi tik modoj ichtaka.
Ma ninemi senpa iwan ini tachialuni
Copy the link to open in another browser
Shikishkupina ne ilpika pal tiktapua tik ukse tachialuni
Copy the link to share your file:
Shikishkupina ne ilpika pal tikmajmaka mutajkwilul:
Create a { -firefox } Account or sign in
Shikchiwa se mutapujka tik { -firefox } ush shiktali mutukay
Download “{ $name }” with { -send-brand }: simple, safe file sharing
Shiktemulti “{ $name }” iwan { -send-brand }: ichtaka wan te uij
Ne ichtakatajkwilul tesu yek. Shikejeku uksenpa.
Keep links active for up to { $count } days
Manage shared files from any device
Shiktajpia ne tajkwilul takulijtuk ka kanaj
Only { $count } files can be uploaded at a time.
Semaya { $count } tajkwilul weli pal tiktejkultia sansepa.
or click to send up to { $size }
Please enable JavaScript and try again.
Shichiwa ma JavaScript tekiti wan shikejeku uksenpa.
{ -send-brand } lets you share files with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires. So you can keep what you share private and make sure your stuff doesn’t stay online forever.
{ -send-brand } metzpalewia tikmajmaka se tajkwilul iwan taichtakawilis wan se ilpika puliwi nemanha. Yajika, tikpia muichtakayu pal tikmajmaka wan tesu naka senpa mutajtatka tik matapan.
{ -send-brand } will not work with this browser. { -send-short-brand } works best with the latest version of { -firefox }, and will work with the current version of most browsers.
{ -send-brand } tesu yawi tekiti iwan ini tachialuni. { -send-short-brand } tekiti sujsul yek iwan ne tipan tamakalis ipal { -firefox }, wan nusan iwan ne tipan tamakalis ipal miak tachialuni.
{ -send-short-brand } is brought to you by the all-new { -firefox }.
Share the link to your file:
Sign in to send up to { $size }
Shikmajmaka se tajkwilul, te uij wan ichtaka
That file is too big to upload. It should be less than { $size }
Ini tajkwilul sujsul etek pal tiktejkultia. Ma nemi san { $size }.
There is a way to protect your privacy. Join Firefox.
Nemi ken pal tiktajpia ne muichtakayu. Shimuishtuka iwan Firefox.
This browser might not be able to decrypt a file this big.
Ini tachialuni anka te weli kichtakapua ini tajkwilul wey.
This file was shared via { -send-brand } with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires.
Ini tajkwilul kiski itech { -send-brand } iwan taichtakawilis wan se ilpika ka puliwi nemanha.
This password could not be set
Try { -send-brand } for simple, safe file sharing.
Shikejeku { -send-brand } wan shiktakuli ichtaka wan te uij.
Unfortunately this version of Firefox does not support the web technology that powers Firefox Send. You’ll need to update your browser.
Ini tamakalis ipal Firefox tesu kimati ne tzawaltekitilis ne kiyulitia Firefox Send. Nemi pal tikyankwilia ne mutachialuni.
Why does Firefox Send require JavaScript?
Why is my browser not supported?
Your file is encrypted and ready to send
Ne archivoj nemi ichtakawijtuk wan weli tiktitania
